mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_NO, PACKAGE_NAME, PACKAGE_IMG, PACKAGE_TYPE, ORDER_DATE, DELIVERY_CODE, ORDER_ADDRESS,ORDER_NAME,ORDER_TEL,ORDER_PRICE FROM "ORDER" LEFT JOIN ORDER_MENU USING (ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN ORDER_MENU_OPTION USING (ORDER_MENU_NO) JOIN "PACKAGE" USING (PACKAGE_NO) LEFT JOIN "OPTION" USING (OPTION_NO) LEFT JOIN "DELIVERY" USING (ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN "MENU" USING(MENU_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} GROUP BY ORDER_NO,PACKAGE_NAME,PACKAGE_IMG,PACKAGE_TYPE, ORDER_DATE, DELIVERY_CODE, ORDER_ADDRESS,ORDER_NAME,ORDER_TEL,ORDER_PRICE ORDER BY ORDER_NO DESC

SELECT DISTINCT ORDER_MENU_NO, MENU_NO, MENU_NAME, MENU_PRICE, MENU_IMG FROM "ORDER" LEFT JOIN ORDER_MENU USING (ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN ORDER_MENU_OPTION USING (ORDER_MENU_NO) LEFT JOIN "MENU" USING (MENU_NO) WHERE ORDER_NO=#{orderNo} AND MENU_DEL_FL='N' ORDER BY ORDER_MENU_NO

SELECT OPTION_NO, OPTION_NAME, OPTION_COUNT, OPTION_PRICE FROM "ORDER" LEFT JOIN ORDER_MENU USING (ORDER_NO) LEFT JOIN ORDER_MENU_OPTION USING (ORDER_MENU_NO) LEFT JOIN "PACKAGE" USING (PACKAGE_NO) JOIN "OPTION" USING (OPTION_NO) LEFT JOIN "MENU" USING (MENU_NO) WHERE ORDER_MENU_NO=#{orderMenuNo} AND MENU_DEL_FL='N' ORDER BY OPTION_NO
